name: Mat Hoffman's Pro BMX 2
description: Mat Hoffman Pro BMX 2 is a BMX video game endorsed by Mat Hoffman and published by Activision under the Activision O2 label. The game, which serves as a sequel to Mat Hoffman's Pro BMX, was released on August 13, 2002 for the PlayStation 2 and Xbox. A port was released for the GameCube, and a different game with the same title was released for the Game Boy Advance and developed by HotGen.
